content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>  <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:moz="http://www.mozilla.org/2006/browser/search/">    <ShortName>Genesys PGR</ShortName>    <LongName>Search global accession database Genesys PGR</LongName>    <Description></Description>    <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/x-icon">https://www.genesys-pgr.org/html/images/genesys16.ico</Image>    <Image height="256" width="256" type="image/x-icon">https://www.genesys-pgr.org/favicon.ico</Image>    <Image height="64" width="64" type="image/png">https://www.genesys-pgr.org/html/images/genesys64.png</Image>    <Tags>accession, PGR, genesys</Tags>    <Contact>helpdesk@genesys-pgr.org</Contact>    <Query role="example" searchTerms="IRGC 1001" />    <Url type="application/rss+xml" template="https://www.genesys-pgr.org/acn/opensearch?q={searchTerms}&page={startPage?}"/>    <Url type="application/x-suggestions+json" template="https://www.genesys-pgr.org/acn/opensearch-gossip?q={searchTerms}"/>    <Url type="text/html" template="https://www.genesys-pgr.org/acn/search?q={searchTerms}&page={startPage?}"/>        <Attribution>See https://www.genesys-pgr.org/content/terms</Attribution>    <SyndicationRight>limited</SyndicationRight>    <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>    <Language>en</Language>    <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>    <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>        <moz:SearchForm>https://www.genesys-pgr.org/acn/search</moz:SearchForm> </OpenSearchDescription>
